```{r}
reactome_reaction_physical <- reactome_reaction %>% 
    dplyr::filter(`Interaction type` == "physical association", )
```

```{r}
library(biomaRt)
m_genes <- keggList("mmu")
m_genes <- names(m_genes)
m_genes <- gsub("mmu:", "", m_genes)
mmart <- useEnsembl(biomart = "ensembl", dataset = "mmusculus_gene_ensembl")

listAttributes(mmart)
genes <- getBM(attributes = c("ensembl_gene_id", "mgi_symbol"),
               filters = "entrezgene_id",
               values = m_genes,
               mart = mmart)
```
